name: Hunting Rifle
description: The Hunting Rifle is a side-gate loading lever-action rifle, the apex of firearms on Icarus, and a significant upgrade in the long-range firepower available to the Prospector. Like its predecessor theBolt Action Rifle, it fires the7.62mm Round. It and theTrench Shotgunare effective game-changers in surviving theFaunaof Icarus. The Hunting Rifle can fire 100 rounds before breaking, and the talentGunsmithcan increase this to up to a maximum of 125 rounds, so bring aFabricatorfor long trips.
